name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles 2: Battle Nexus
overview: Play with Up To 4 Players! Venture with the Turtles to shell and back in TMNT 2: BattleNexus . Pick up the action on a strange new planet with mysterious new technology. Two tail-kickin' modes deliver green-knuckled action including Story and Battle Nexus Mode! -Specialized moves for each Turtle! -4-player shell-action! -Cooperative play & head-to-head four player competition
